summary: Comprehensive testing of refactored Swing Master Amps app. Backend: 24/24 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All key features verified - Homepage, Shop, Product Detail, Cart with shipping options, Login, Admin Dashboard working correctly.

issues: Session not persisted across direct navigation - requires re-login when directly navigating to /admin

critical_code_review_comments: Backend refactoring successful - server.py now slim ~100 lines with all logic in modular files
All routers properly mounted with /api prefix
Both auth systems working: antenna app (/api/auth/*) and store (/api/store/login, /api/store/register)
Auto-tune and calculate endpoints returning valid physics calculations
Admin endpoints properly protected with authentication
Latest APK endpoint working with GitHub integration
Frontend correctly uses store auth for e-commerce features
Shipping options showing correctly: Standard $15, Priority $25, Express $45
NC Sales Tax (7.5%) correctly calculated in cart
Admin Dashboard has proper access control (redirects non-admin users)
seed_data_creation: Test users created during registration tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend was refactored from monolithic 4500+ line server.py to modular structure. All tests passing. Frontend is Vite/React e-commerce site (NOT Expo). Two separate auth systems: antenna app (/api/auth/*) and store (/api/store/*). Admin dashboard requires store admin login (is_admin flag). PayPal and CashApp payment integrations are MOCKED. Stripe uses test key.

backend_api.POST /api/calculate: Full antenna calculation with SWR, gain, patterns

frontend_pages.homepage: Loads with Swing Master Amps branding, CB Amplifiers lineup
frontend_pages.product_detail: Shows full product info with Add to Cart button
frontend_pages.cart: Shows items, 3 shipping options, NC tax 7.5%, total calculation
frontend_pages.login: Login form working with admin credentials
frontend_pages.admin_dashboard: Products/Orders/Members tabs, product form, access control
